release.action: Fixed bogus popup menu opening when scrolling with two-fingers on a trackpad.
Implemented export to template code and import from template code.
The print dialog now remembers its last settings.
Simplified shopping list. Volumes are now counted down depending on how many factories have been built. Added a price column to show how much money is still needed to complete the complex.
Changed light gray colors to black for printing.
Install script on Linux now creates missing directories.
Factory complex files can now specified on the command-line to open them with Xadrian.
Only one instance of Xadrian can be started. A second call passes control (and command-line arguments) over to the first instance.
Implemented awtAppClassName so Xadrian works correctly on modern Linux window managers like Gnome Shell.
Implemented appUserModelId so Xadrian can be pinned to the Windows 7 taskbar.
Registering file association for *.x3c on Windows so factory complex files can be opened by double-clicking.
Fixed Null-Pointer-Exception in sector selection dialog when moving the mouse before the map is fully displayed.
Factory tree now correctly honors ignored races. Factories of ignored races are now still listed but have a lower priority in the cheapest factory list.
Switched from manual javaw.exe start to a custom EXE launcher created by launch4j.
Fixed problem with space characters in command line parameters on Linux/Unix.
Added install script in Unix assembly. This script installs Xadrian globally on Linux/Unix.
Terran Shipyards are now considered for buying complex construction kits in X3: Albion Prelude.
The change-prices dialog now only displays the wares which are used by the current complex. This also solves the missing Ice problem in X3: Albion Prelude.
Game can now be configured in the preferences to avoid asking for it every time a new complex is created.
Removed fixed font sizes in HTML text panes so font size can be controlled by the operating system.
Made some dialogs resizable and sector map scalable.
Language can now be configured in the preferences dialog.
Error messages are now displayed in an error dialog if possible and error message is copied to the clipboard to make error reporting easier.
Fixed status bar in main window which never displayed anything.
Added donation button.
Added multi-game feature to support X3TC and X3AP in the same application.
Added splash screen displaying the application loading progress.
Theme (Java LookAndFeel) can now be configured in the preferences dialog.
Added the new bonus sector "Harmony Of Perpetuity".
Added new suns.xml data file which replaces the hardcoded sun data.
messages.properties and the XML files are now also read from the lib/data directory for easier modification.
Added two missing asteroids in Guiding Star.
Fixed printing.
Fixed some layout problems in complex table.
Fixed Null-Pointer-Exception which occured when adding a factory which is already in the complex.
Added some missing german translations.
Made factory resource info gray to make the factory name more important in the complex table.
Added Polish translation. Thanks to Mariusz and sorry that it took a year until it was finally published...
Added up/down buttons to control factory quantities without opening the quantity dialog.
Improved shopping list. You can now use up/down counters to note which factories you have already built.
Applied nicer style to complex data. Sections can now be collapsed and expanded by clicking the section headers.
Fixed error which occured sometimes when loading the same complex two times.
Added new preference for displaying factory resources in complex table. (Patch contributed by Milan Gvoždík)
Implemented better asteroid yield selection for mines.
Fixed Ion/Tracker mine bug which was fixed also in X3TC 2.7.
Added player sector.
Added missing Protein Paste Blending Facility L which was introduced in X3TC 2.1.
Added Crystal fabs of size L for all races which were added in X3TC 2.1.
Updated database to X3 Terran Conflict 2.0.
Improved base-complex calculation: Xadriannow also considers crystal fabs from other races instead of always using the cheapest one.
Fixed german translation of "Silicon".
Implemented possibility to change the buy/sell prices of wares in a complex. It's also possible to completely disable trading with a ware.
All window locations and sizes are now saved and restored. AddFactory dialog can now be resized and splitter position is also saved and restored.
Fixed scroll behavior in complex view (When view is repainted then the previous scroll position is restored.
Added a workaround for Java bug #4699955 which prevented correct focus on spinner controls.
Improved loading/saving of complexes. Complex names are now used as suggested filenames (For Save-As) and the last selected directory in file chooser is now remembered.
Implemented shopping list in complex view. It lists the factories which must be bought, their volumes and the nearest shipyard where they can be buyed (If complex is connected to a sector).
Complex can now be connected to a sector. The suns are then determined automatically.
Quantity of mines can now be changed.
Added storage capacity information to add-factory dialog and added storage capacity statistics to complex view.

The suns dialog now no longer makes a difference between 300% and 400% because the game handles everything above or equal than 300 as the same. Also added the 200% which is not used in X3TC but may show up later (At least it was present in Reunion).
Added factory listing grouped by product and cheapest factories to add-factory-dialog.
Added popup menu to complex editor.
Added copy/selectAll menu items.
Added preferences dialog to set the used races.
Closing the unsaved-changes-warning on exit now performs a cancel instead of closing the application.
Fixed conflict with LANG variable of unix locale system. Language can now be enforced with the XADRIAN_LANG variable instead.
Initial release.
